tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE FarmDeliveries (
    delivery_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    source_farm VARCHAR(255),
    destination_table VARCHAR(255),
    delivery_date DATE,
    delivery_time TIME
);

CREATE TABLE DeliveryTracking (
    tracking_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    delivery_id INT,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    tracking_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (delivery_id) REFERENCES FarmDeliveries(delivery_id)
);

CREATE TABLE delivery_routes (
    route_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    supplier_id INT,
    driver_id INT,
    delivery_date DATE,
    delivery_status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE delivery_routes (
    route_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    start_location VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    end_location VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    distance DECIMAL(8,2) NOT NULL,
    delivery_time TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE orders (
    order_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT NOT NULL,
    product_id INT NOT NULL,
    quantity INT NOT NULL,
    order_date TIMESTAMP
);
